about.help: Organic Chemistry and Molecular Biology was retrieved from Youtube from the channel J. Christopher Anderson, and was created on 1/22/2014.

contents.params: Organic Chemistry sits at the base of all modern understanding of biology.  You don't need to understand the topic in great detail, but let's refresh what you learned from Chemistry 101.

materials.name: Accompanying Slides
materials.path: partials/trails/youtubeClotho/Basics of OOP and Organic Chemistry.pptx

pages.title: DNA structure and the Reverse Complement operation

contents.params: DNA is double stranded, but we represent it as a single strand for convenience. Often you'll need to know the sequence of the other strand (the reverse-complement).
